name: Shape Warfare (dreino10)
description: This game is a top town shooter inspired by the gameplay of Asteroids and the visual style of Geometry wars.  In this game the player controls a spaceship and the objective is to try to survive as many waves of enemies as you can while accumulating points with each enemy that is destroyed by the player. The spaceship is controlled with the arrow keys and you can fire lasers from the ship  by clicking the fire button in game with your mouse.
